game.name: Shining Plume 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explore a new, larger world, full of secrets and hidden locations in this direct sequel to Shining Plume featuring 3 different endings!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore a new, larger world, full of secrets and hidden locations in this direct sequel to Shining Plume featuring 3 different endings!

reviewHighlights.text: This is an interesting sequel to the first Shining Plume. You have been sent to deal with a serious threat, and in so doing, have come back to the hom...
